name: Trials in Tainted Space
content:
files:
- game_archive: https://www.fenoxo.com/play/latest_airzip.php
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/TiTS 0.8.065.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game.zip
    src: game_archive
- execute:
    args: game.zip
    description: Extracting game data
    file: unzip
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: game.zip
    description: Removing temporary ZIP file
    file: rm
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0/Resources
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0/Resources/WebKit
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0/Resources/Licenses
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0/Resources/Licenses/pcre2
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0/Resources/Licenses/pixman
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/TiTS 0.8.065/Adobe AIR/Versions/1.0/Resources/Licenses/cairo
require-binaries: unzip, rm
